name: CampaignAppDetail
desc: The app data to fetch from campaign-level reports.

items.name: adamId
items.desc: Displays as app:{adamId} in ReportingCampaign.Each time you use an adamId in the API, it must match the adamId in your campaign. Use Get a Campaign or Get All Campaigns to obtain your adamId and correlate it to the correct campaign.

items.name: appName
items.desc: The App Store Connect app identifier, which displays as app:{appName} in ReportingCampaign.
